pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
meanings: to appear on the cover of a magazine

lessons.japanese: 本を表紙で判断するな。
lessons.english: Don't judge a book by its cover.

lessons.japanese: 本をその表紙で判断してはいけない。
lessons.english: Don't judge a book by its cover.

lessons.japanese: 父は表紙の取れた古い辞書を使っています。
lessons.english: My father uses an old dictionary whose cover has come off.

lessons.japanese: 昨日メアリーは表紙が青い本をくれた。
lessons.english: Yesterday Mary gave me a book the cover of which was blue.

lessons.japanese: 昨日メアリーは表紙が青い本をくれた。
lessons.english: Yesterday, Mary gave me a book with a blue cover.

lessons.japanese: 昨日メアリーは表紙が青い本をくれた。
lessons.english: Yesterday Mary gave me a book the cover of which was blue.

lessons.japanese: 父は表紙の取れた古い辞書を使っています。
lessons.english: My father uses an old dictionary whose cover has come off.

lessons.japanese: 本を表紙で判断するな。
lessons.english: Don't judge a book by its cover.

lessons.japanese: 本をその表紙で判断してはいけない。
lessons.english: Don't judge a book by its cover.
